title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127, the close button and tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items are expected to stay on the same line as the label regardless of the view size. The close button should remain located to the far right corner.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the close button and tool items move below the label.
